Welcome to the Department of Mathematics, Statistics, and Computer Science (MSCS) at the University of Illinois at Chicago!  Studying at UIC means joining a large and active graduate student population boasting an enrollment of 150 graduate students in programs covering a wide range of the mathematical firmament, including geometry-topology-dynamics, 3-manifolds, algebraic geometry, number theory, logic, applied and industrial mathematics, financial mathematics, statistics and operations research, combinatorics, computer science, and the teaching of mathematics. Our graduates obtain competitive and prestigious placements throughout academia and industry.  Situated in the heart of Chicago, UIC and other distinguished institutions of higher learning in the metropolitan area create an exciting atmosphere for the study of mathematics. We look forward to you joining our graduate program. Many opportunities await you!
